mapper.update: update admin_t set login_acct = #{loginAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_pswd = #{userPswd,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, login_acct, user_pswd, user_name, email, create_time from admin_t
